Event.name: Visit_host
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Visitor</fen> matches location with a <fen>Host</fen> by going to a place strongly associated with a <fen>Host</fen>, the <fen>Host_location</fen> (often a place of residence, employment, or government), in order to achieve a <fen>Purpose</fen>. The <fen>Host</fen> allows the use of his/her resources. The visit is often social in nature.</def-root>

Arg.name: Visitor
Arg.definition: <def-root>The sentient entity that heads toward and is temporarily with the <fen>Host</fen> in order to fulfil some <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Host
Arg.definition: <def-root>An individual that allows the use of his or her resources for the benefit of the <fen>Visitor</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The activity that is enabled by the hospitality of the <fen>Host</fen> and that the <fen>Visitor</fen> wishes to achieve.</def-root>

Arg.name: Normal_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location that the <fen>Visitor</fen> normally resides in or is (permanently) associated with.</def-root>

Arg.name: Host_location
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location associated with the <fen>Host</fen>, where the <fen>Visitor</fen> arrives at and remains during the visit.</def-root>
